Name: Run - Windows Installer
Description: Runs the Windows Installer to non-interactively install an MSI

Parameters.Name: MsiFilePath
Parameters.Label: Msi File Path
Parameters.HelpText: This is the path of the MSI file that will be installed.

Parameters.Name: Action
Parameters.Label: Action
Parameters.HelpText: The task to perform with the MSI, options include install, repair or remove.

Parameters.Name: Properties
Parameters.Label: Properties
Parameters.HelpText:
Properties that will be passed to the MSI separated by lines. Properties are in the format key=value, note that values with spaces in the must be quoted. 

    Key=Value
    Key="Value"
